Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one position for an artist anywhere; and that is upright

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: But I did make some money doing commercials. I did fourteen in one year

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: But it is a hard, it's a hard profession teaching acting

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I did two or three plays every summer

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't have any extra money. But I can't say that I had a hard early career

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have worked with some great directors

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that you get something for your acting from almost anything you do

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very lucky in as much as I played a lot of tennis

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a lot of energy to teach

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: The career doesn't get any easier. A career stays tough

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Well Sid Pollack was... He was I would say probably, probably the most influential on me

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: We were like psychedelic folk combined with Sonic Youth's noise

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great, because different groups of kids can laugh at each other and still enjoy the show

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I just saw metal as another tool for me to use

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make it sound too much like a synth, it will just sound like a guitar part played on a synth

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Trent likes to record guitars direct, whereas I've always preferred playing through an amplifier

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: But the exposure we got by doing the stint with Nine Inch Nails brought us a lot of attention

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: It was a good chance for us to play for people who would never have heard us otherwise

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy with the way everyone presents themselves onstage

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: We're playing the same songs, the same way, that we have for years

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Each member of the band has varied influences, and the same diversity is reflected in our fanbase

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to come to L.A. to visit, and then I like to come to rainy old London because it's home

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked 'Star Wars,' but I wasn't an uberfan like many people are

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: Goals are ever-changing. I didn't set out to be in a 'Star Wars' film but now I've been in one

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I can knit quite well. I make really long scarves

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I can prepare for what's to come because I don't know what will

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: Your life goes on, and then your life goes on plus 'Star Wars.' It's just been an incredible time

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been one for crushing on famous people

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: Both my parents are creative. My dad did act when he was younger, but they're both very creative

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: My film knowledge is pretty shocking. I'm trying to correct that

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: Sadly, people think a guy and a girl can't be friends without something romantic going on

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: When you come right down to it, I guess I really am pretty bland

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I am naive about certain things. But I'm glad. I know all I want to know

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: If you live what you believe, you will always have the respect of others

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: God isn't really interested in our batting averages

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Society is what we make of it, so we'd better try to make it the best we can

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Tommie Aaron taught me how to have a good attitude, to be easy going and not get uptight

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't usually get treated unfairly. You usually get what you deserve

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to give people the impression that I'm an almost perfect human being

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether I'm hitting .100 or .300, I have resolved to at least enjoy every game

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: To work with children anywhere is just plain fun

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought being an artist was a lazy job. I was wrong

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I read that prior to the advent of color TV, most people dreamed in black and white

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: The vocabulary I use has to reflect the people I'm trying to communicate with

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: Artists talk in 'art speak.'

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I had no interest in high school besides art

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I take a lot of pictures

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: Ironically, my paintings don't photograph well

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: You just can't control your art in the future

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I talk to anybody the same way I talk to Moby

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't work without music

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Have fun, be active. Ride a bike instead of driving, for example

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Select your friendships carefully. Gather people around you who will reinforce your lifestyle

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: A long healthy life is no accident. It begins with good genes, but it also depends on good habits

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking is the only way proven to stave off cognitive decline - it works

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Having a purpose and knowing exactly what your values are will add additional years to your life

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to know why you get up every morning

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Black beans and soy beans are the cornerstones of longevity diets around the world

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Serve yourself, put the food away, then eat

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Deepen your existing spiritual commitment

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the big things I've learned is that there's an advantage to regular low-intensity activity

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never going to satisfy everybody, so I decided to satisfy myself

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to rock 'n roll. But my finest suit, of all the things I do, is as a songwriter

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to laugh, it's my main thing. I love to abuse the English language

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the subtlety and tonal range of the acoustic guitar

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I choose to express myself

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Strats are my favorite electric guitars, and I've got quite a collection

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Now is the only thing that exists

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My upbringing made me think that real legitimate music is written, not heard

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: MTV didn't call. I guess I wasn't hip and groovy enough

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It was so much fun playing simple American bluegrass. I got to meet Doc Watson

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: If you never give up, you'll be successful

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Take pride in exactly what it is you do and remember it's okay to fail as long as you don't give up

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: The decathlon includes ten separate events and they all matter. You can't work on just one of them

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Try everything, because you're never sure what you're going to be great at

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had to have some kind of failure before I was successful

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young child, I was never a crier. I never cried to get my way, or even when I was in pain

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was little, I wasn't allowed to put sugar on my breakfast cereal because it made me so hyper

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young athlete, it was first about having fun; then it was about winning

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: I call myself a chameleon

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, the decathlon is its own little society and I am part of that culture

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: What I find most exciting about online video is that it's the future

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned not to feed the trolls. I just don't respond

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Appointment viewing is dead, and I think it is going away

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have to be able to come and go as I please. I could not sit in some office

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: You can learn a lot from somebody's video bio: if you're not going to gel with the actor or a crew

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: The issue of doing an adaptation of a book is the theater of the mind, and so you always face that

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: The production value of YouTube videos is not there

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: The power lies with content creators now, but if you can't reach people, there's no point

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I hardly ever go to the movies

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: We all thought we'd have flying cars by now, but we don't

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not going to be easy to change things

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to do what you know is right

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I never met a Jesuit before I applied for the order

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: A revolution is interesting insofar as it avoids like the plague the plague it promised to heal

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to prove my life. I just have to live

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to die with my boots on

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: One is called to live nonviolently, even if the change one works for seems impossible

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to struggle to stay alive and be of use as long as you can

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was publishing when I was 20, 21. And it really never stopped

Quote.Author: Daniel Berrigan
Quote.QuoteValue: Most Americans would agree that Plowshares is a Theatre of the Absurd

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Little deeds are like little seeds, they grow to flowers or to weeds

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief causes suffering and disease

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The mill cannot grind with the water that is past

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind must be cured as well as the body, as the mind so is the body

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: He who obeys God's laws finds him a father. He who disobeys them, finds him a judge

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is a physical and spiritual epitome of the Universe

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Study first, play afterwards

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The best physicians are Dr. Diet, Dr. Quiet, and Dr. Merryman

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The spiritual always did exist, always will. It is eternal, it is changeless

Quote.Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The spiritual is the cause of action. Action is life

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no big groupie fans or anything

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: So I went and visited a doctor and he diagnosed me with reactive arthritis

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky the arthritis happened at the time that it did because of the record

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really paid attention to sales until the second record

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: Though, since the first record, I've dramatically changed my expectations for our records

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to try and find a way to express happiness without sounding corny

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: With our first two records we backed ourselves into a hole musically

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: We were perceived as a post-grunge band

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: The touring for this album was definitely going to be the most intense touring we've done

Quote.Author: Daniel Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: We were really motivated to do something with this record overseas, even though I hate touring

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: Cities are the greatest creations of humanity

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: To provide meaningful architecture is not to parody history but to articulate it

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a kid with artistic yearnings brought up in the Bronx, you don't get fed up too easily

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get to sleep when I'm in New York. Really. I'm living on adrenaline

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: And of course I like Berlin a lot. It's such an interesting city

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: We will work with everybody for the good of New York

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: We all came to see that site. We all walked around it. It is already sacred

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: The Spiral Gallery may happen, too. It is not dependent on government funding

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a project that touched me as an immigrant and as a New Yorker

Quote.Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a fantastic responsibility and a wonderful moment

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always considered myself to be a travelling soul. I've never felt out of place anywhere

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: Outreach appearances in the schools are usually part of my contracts, and I love doing them

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: Mozart is my first strength

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge dog person; I love to hug and kiss them

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to take care of myself. It's about self-preservation

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a bit dressed up, even on casual days. I suppose that's the performer in me

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: Music can be a source of escapism

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a famously successful opera singer. I wanted that since I was eight

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents kept me very grounded

Quote.Author: Danielle de Niese
Quote.QuoteValue: I believed in Santa Claus until I was 12!

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's important to be kind to the world before it disappears if we don't take care of it

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love a little bit of a change

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I love David Hasselhoff!

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a big scaredy-cat; horror films terrify me

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm always on the go, I'm always on the run

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to be able to multiply because then I could be in lots of different places at once

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I really did graduate at 14, and I go to college in the Los Angeles area near where I live

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done a handful of great roles

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I look younger; I feel younger. I'm in no rush to grow up or seem older to people

Quote.Author: Danielle Panabaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I could be playing high school until I'm, like, 30 or something, at the rate I'm growing

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a traditionalist. I have certain values I live by

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: Death can't be so bad if mom went through it. It makes it easier for the child to follow

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: If I stunk for some reason, you can always blame it on the character

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: The choreographer for the Milton Berle show wanted me to audition. I walked away from that

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be worried about labeling me

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a good man, but he was a con man. He was a wanderer, nomadic

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: I need distractions. Good distractions, not bad ones. A good distraction for me is a great play

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: I fell in love with the most beautiful girl in the Bronx

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: I have sons, and they have never said the word hell in front of me or my wife. That's the truth

Quote.Author: Danny Aiello
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was the total influence. My father was what we call a nomadic person; he was a wanderer

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could make millions of dollars being a softball player, I would quit acting in a second

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is summer camp. I come and talk and try to make a TV show funny

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Spin-offs were never really my thing

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am really into '70s music, like The Rolling Stones, The Doors and what not

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have done about 15 movies so far and am on my 5th season on That '70s Show

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a hip-hop fanatic, and rock fanatic

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I then moved to LA when I was 16... but before that I had done a play on Broadway

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm working, I'm not D.J.'ing. And if I'm not working, I'm D.J.'ing all the time

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Plenty of people are raised Catholic and then aren't Catholic anymore, like any religion

Quote.Author: Danny Masterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I generally will answer any question about anything

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I would want my legacy to be that I was a great son, father and friend

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat everyone the way you would want to be treated... this can be applied to any situation

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of my success was having a place to play as a kid

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite NBA team are the houston rockets and favorite college team are the duke blue devils

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Sports are not for everyone

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that is unexpected is the X-factor

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no formula to making it to the NFL other than good fortune and and playing well in college

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all sports

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to play pool

Quote.Author: Dante Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I fumble or drop a ball I am embarrassed

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot tell you how happy and in love I am with everything

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: Endangered forests are being slaughtered for toilet paper

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: You feel touched and honored and alive when you give to someone

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to save the world, but you can be in the world-that's where the beauty comes from

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: I stopped dating for six months a year ago. Dating requires a lot of energy and focus

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: I love men in bed when they are sleeping. But then they have to go and wake up

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually get recognized for Spaceballs

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: To play a bag woman is brave for any woman

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been on shows that go for shock value

Quote.Author: Daphne Zuniga
Quote.QuoteValue: The planet does nothing but support us, and we are constantly committing crimes against nature

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm becoming a professional nomad and enjoying that whole part of my life

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: How I long to fall just a little bit, to dance out of the lines and stray from the light

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing 'February' made me realize that breaking form is a way of letting the song be human

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes life gives us lessons sent in ridiculous packaging

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Therapy was the biggest romance of my life

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: But if you're looking to be spooked by really tall trees then you've got to go to Washington State

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: And where does magic come from? I think that magic's in the learning

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: But social justice and the environment are very tied together in my head

Quote.Author: Dar Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: You always have to wrestle with chaos

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: There's two times of year for me: Football season, and waiting for football season

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: We went to church every Sunday. When I was a kid, the only time I sang was around my family

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in high school, I read all of Neil Simon's plays

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: I work hard to let my wife know how much I love her. I try to do that every day

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I get the respect as a singer. With this record, I wanted to bring respect to my band

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wanted to go out and make a record that I've always wanted to make since I was a kid

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Ray Charles has always been a big part of my life

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: I expect to make a career out of country music

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to be married to me, and it was a lot harder when I was younger!

Quote.Author: Darius Rucker
Quote.QuoteValue: I've known Tiger since he was 18. Tiger is a great guy. I am so happy for him right now

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: I am depressed sometimes, but it's not what keeps me at home or focused on work

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Middle East in the summertime, to keep cool, a lot of people sleep on the rooftops

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was money-motivated, I wouldn't have joined a rock band with three other Armenian guys

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to grow and top myself

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always searching for something bigger, faster and better, and Slayer came up with that

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be a member of System of a Down. That will never change

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, even U2 took a little time off, and then they came back with a new sound

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: Every song I've written is luck, I think; it's luck - 'How did that just happen?'

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever put down bands

Quote.Author: Daron Malakian
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is an emotion, and I put it out there

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace in Palestine is inevitable. The question is how do we make it happen today

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: I've said my patience is not infinite

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: My brother went on to have a long and sordid career

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: Every one of our congressional offices, every day, is under attack

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: Cleveland's a great place when you're a kid. You hardly ever get sunburned, without the sun shining

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a past

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't recall having a gun. I really don't. I don't think I ever pulled a gun on anyone in my life

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an I.Q. of 100 plus a little bit. I have to work real hard to get things when I read

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: My father and all my uncles on both sides served in the military in World War II and Korea

Quote.Author: Darrell Issa
Quote.QuoteValue: You can call me a pain. I'll accept that as a compliment

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideal is to wake up in the morning and run around the meadow naked

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the idea that biodiesel has the potential to support farmers, especially the family farms

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: That's a big goal of mine, to try and grow as much of my own food as possible

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been good in the financial and business arenas. I handle the creative side of things

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: No one really wants to send their kids off to die for oil

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of those people who figures that it will eventually sort itself out

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: Filmmaking is such a collaborative medium

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a humanitarian, supporting animal rights activists, human rights activists, it's all the same

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: That will only happen if I have a bout of amnesia or if I feel like mooning someone in the audience

Quote.Author: Daryl Hannah
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be a giant enabler

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know much about him; never heard him say more than nope or yup

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I like women. I really like women

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: With what dope I got I think it fills me in pretty well

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: I deserve all the love you can spare me. And I want a lot more than I deserve

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: She seems to be having a pretty good time despite her worrying. That's Lily

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to look on the bright side, even if there ain't one

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: Strictly speaking, there are no real substitutes for sexual satisfaction

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: Feed the lettuce to the bunny and eat the bunny

Quote.Author: Dashiell Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: The roof might fall in; anything could happen
